title: Condensed milk

preparations.content: Place butter and water into mixing bowl and heat <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.

Add all remaining ingredients and blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>, until smooth. Scrape down sides and bottom of mixing bowl with spatula.  Transfer into sterilised sealable jars and set aside, uncovered, to cool (approx. 30 minutes). Seal jars and store in refrigerator until ready to use (see Tip).

hintsAndTricks: You can store this condensed milk in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
